scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ, bearing the cross, with visible wounds. He is flanked by two figures. To his left, a figure in an orange tunic looks up at Christ with hands clasped. To his right, a figure in a blue tunic holds a bundle of nails and a green leafy branch. The background is a rich gold leaf, suggesting a divine or sacred context, with an architectural element of an arched frame behind Christ. The overall composition is framed by decorative borders.
